text: @jesseparkes The TLC should run out of spare blocks first. The cache is written in a sequential loop. Very efficient for wear.

user.description: Storage Editor, PC Perspective / Retired Navy CPO
user.name: Allyn Malventano

text: @jesseparkes the cache sits in it's own area of each die. Wear leveling does happen, but it's limited to that area. No sharing with the TLC.

user.description: Storage Editor, PC Perspective / Retired Navy CPO
user.name: Allyn Malventano

text: @jesseparkes per Samsung, the SLC cache area should outlast the TLC storage area. TLC grade flash lasts much longer when written as SLC.
